title: ranked placements
body: this is so crap, i just finished my provisionals for ranked and won 9 games and lost 1 and i got put into bronze 3, thats pretty pathetic riot, season 4 i won 8/10 and got put into bronze 4, this is getting stupid please answer

replies.body: If you won 8/10 games last season, got into Bronze 4, and then you won 9/10 games this season, and got into Bronze 3, why are you angry about that?
